content:
When I type some message in the message box while Night mode is enabled. It is really hard for me to see the typed text. Is it only me or this happens to others too. Or is there an issue for this already (p.s I tried searching for the related issue but was unable to find it)
pasted image

This is due to Grammarly extension. I face this too many times :slight_smile:
Reload the page and everything should be fine.
Yeah that's true. Thanks for the quick response. :slight_smile:

Should we report a bug with Grammarly about this? I feel like every other product with a night theme must run into the same bug, and they should be able to just inspect the background-color of the text box and match it.
